record.title: ORDERS FOR MONDAY, MARCH 19, 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m., Monday, March 19; that on Monday, following the prayer and the pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, and the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day; that the Senate then proceed to S. 214 as provided for under a previous order.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
